items.content_html: üßà ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.

items.content_html: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.
items.title: inversify/monorepo: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.
items.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
items.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: Inkwell Backend is a personal, non-commercial project powering the Inkwell platform with a lightweight, secure, and scalable backend built using modern APIs
items.title: viktoria-yarema/Inkwell_Backend: Inkwell Backend is a personal, non-commercial project powering the Inkwell platform with a lightweight, secure, and scalable backend built using modern APIs

items.content_html: VeriFi is a document authentication toolkit that leverages SHA-256 hashing and digital signatures to verify file integrity and provenance. It offers both a lightweight web UI and CLI, real-time verification reports, audit history tracking, optional LDAP auth, REST API support, and plugin-driven blockchain anchoring.
items.title: Sourodyuti/VeriFi: VeriFi is a document authentication toolkit that leverages SHA-256 hashing and digital signatures to verify file integrity and provenance. It offers both a lightweight web UI and CLI, real-time verification reports, audit history tracking, optional LDAP auth, REST API support, and plugin-driven blockchain anchoring.

items.content_html: A lightweight fetch wrapper with pluggable caching strategies (cache-first, network-first, stale-while-revalidate) for Node.js, browser, and memory environments.
items.title: code-soubhik/cache-kit: A lightweight fetch wrapper with pluggable caching strategies (cache-first, network-first, stale-while-revalidate) for Node.js, browser, and memory environments.

items.content_html: Today Notes is a lightweight, daily task management application built using Next.js, React, TailwindCSS, Prisma, and Postgresql - Supabase. It allows users to create tasks that expire in 24 hours, providing a clean and minimalist interface with support for dark and light themes.
items.title: Keyyard/today-notes: Today Notes is a lightweight, daily task management application built using Next.js, React, TailwindCSS, Prisma, and Postgresql - Supabase. It allows users to create tasks that expire in 24 hours, providing a clean and minimalist interface with support for dark and light themes.

items.content_html: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
items.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.

items.content_html: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: EasyTracker ‚Äì Smart Time Tracking & Project Management for Freelancers A lightweight and intuitive web app for tracking work sessions, managing clients and projects, setting custom tags, receiving smart reminders (including SMS), and generating detailed reports. Integrates with Google Calendar and invoicing platforms to streamline your workflow.
items.title: ofekhadjadj/EasyTracker: EasyTracker ‚Äì Smart Time Tracking & Project Management for Freelancers A lightweight and intuitive web app for tracking work sessions, managing clients and projects, setting custom tags, receiving smart reminders (including SMS), and generating detailed reports. Integrates with Google Calendar and invoicing platforms to streamline your workflow.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.
